content:
Apologies for that, here's the full 2-week itinerary:

Day 3:
Morning:

* 10:00 am: Breakfast at Slipway Hotel
* 11:30 am: Visit Tingatinga Arts Cooperative Society (rated 4.4/5) - explore Tanzanian art and purchase unique souvenirs. Address: Haile Selassie Rd, Oysterbay, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 15 minutes by car)

Afternoon:

* 1:00 pm: Lunch at Mediterraneo Restaurant (rated 4.4/5) - a beautiful Italian restaurant by the beach. Address: Toure Dr, Kawe Beach, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 20 minutes by car)
* 3:00 pm: Take a boat tour of the Dar es Salaam Marine Reserve (rated 4.5/5) - enjoy the ocean views and spot marine life. (Duration: 3 hours)

Evening:

* 7:30 pm: Dinner at Mamboz Restaurant (rated 4.5/5) - indulge in delicious Tanzanian BBQ dishes. Address: Morogoro Rd, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 35 minutes by car)
* 9:30 pm: Drinks and dancing at Elements Club (rated 4.1/5) - one of the most popular nightclubs in Dar es Salaam. Address: Haile Selassie Rd, Oysterbay, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 20 minutes by car)

Day 4:
Morning:

* 10:00 am: Breakfast at Slipway Hotel
* 12:00 pm: Visit Mwenge Woodcarvers Market (rated 4.1/5) - discover local handicrafts and souvenirs. Address: Sam Nujoma Rd, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 30 minutes by car)

Afternoon:

* 2:00 pm: Lunch at Ristorante Bella Napoli (rated 4.4/5) - enjoy authentic Italian cuisine. Address: Chole Rd, Masaki, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 20 minutes by car)
* 4:00 pm: Relax at the hotel pool or enjoy water sports at the Slipway Hotel

Evening:

* 7:30 pm: Dinner at 305 Karafuu (rated 4.6/5) - offering a mix of African, Indian, and European dishes. Address: Karafuu St, Kinondoni, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 25 minutes by car)
* 9:30 pm: Cocktails at Karambezi Café (rated 4.6/5) - a seafront cafe with an impressive cocktail menu. Address: Toure Dr, Sea Cliff Hotel, Dar es Salaam. (Approximately 20 minutes by car)

Days 5-7: Zanzibar Trip

* Fly to Zanzibar (approximately 20 minutes) and check in at Zanzi Resort (rated 4.5/5), located on the west coast of Zanzibar, offering private beach access and ocean views.

Day 5:

* Explore Stone Town, visit the House of Wonders, and enjoy a guided Spice Tour
* Dinner at Emerson Spice Tea House Restaurant (rated 4.7/5)

Day 6:

* Day trip to Prison Island (Changuu) for snorkeling and meeting giant tortoises
* Dinner at Forodhani Gardens Night Market

Day 7:

* Relax at Nungwi Beach on the north coast of Zanzibar
* Dinner at Langi Langi Beach Bungalows Restaurant (rated 4.5/
